name: 不想一个人MV
lyric:
不想一个人 词/顺子 曲/SHUNZA,EILEEN HUANG & LANDY
AND I'M ASKIN' YOU IF YOU COULD STAY THE NIGHT
RIGHT HERE IN MY ARMS HOLDING ME SO TIGHT
AND I AM PRAYIN' TO YOU DON'T EVER LET ME GO
NOT WITHOUT TELLING ME THAT YOU'RE LOVIN' ME SO
'CAUSE I DON'T WANNA SPEND MY NIGHTS ALONE CTYIN'
I DON'T WANNA BE ALRIGHT IF I'M WITHOUT YOU, BOY!
SO JUST HERE MY SCREAMS, NO,I'M NOT FINE, NO, NO...
PLEASE TELL ME, JUST WHERE AM I TO GO ?
走在大街上 我想的都是你
他们说我爱上的也许是空气
假如有一天 你不再想理我
在晚上我会想要对你说
我不想一个人晚上偷偷哭泣
我不想一个人晚上慢慢窒息
可是我希望和你长久生活 在一起
从早到晚 从春到夏季
I NEED YOU!
I WANT YOU!
YOU'RE NECESSARY IN MY LIFE!
I SEE YOU !
I SAID I'M BREATHIN'YOU!
YOU'RE THE ONLY THING I'M LIVIN' FOR
IS THAT ALRIGHT WITH YOU?
I NEED YOU,
I NEED YOU..NOW
I'M ASKING YOU.....
I DON'T WANNA SPEND MY NIGHTS ALONE CRYIN, NO, NO...
I DON'T WANNA BE ALRIGHT IF I'M WITHOUT YOU, BOY!
SO JUST HERE MY SCREAMS, NO,I'M NOT FINE, NO, NO...
PLEASE TELL ME, JUST WHERE AM I TO GO ?
我不想一个人晚上偷偷哭泣
我不想一个人晚上慢慢窒息
可是我希望和你长久生活 在一起
从早到晚 从春到夏季
I DON'T WANNA SPEND MY NIGHTS ALONE CRYIN'
I DON'T WANNA BE ALRIGHT IF I'M WITHOUT YOU, BOY!
SO JUST HERE MY SCREAMS, NO,I'M NOT FINE, NO, NO...
PLEASE TELL ME, JUST WHERE AM I TO GO ?
我不想一个人晚上偷偷哭泣
我不想一个人晚上慢慢窒息
可是我希望和你长久生活 在一起
从早到晚 从春到夏季
I DON'T WANNA SPEND MY NIGHTS ALONE CRYIN
I DON'T WANNA BE ALRIGHT IF I'M WITHOUT YOU, BOY!
SO JUST HERE MY SCREAMS, NO,I'M NOT FINE, NO, NO...
PLEASE TELL ME, JUST WHERE AM I TO GO ?
